title: Taliyah seems buggy
body: Her abilities seem to get a little cluttered I noticed, like when your trying to spam abilities they won't activate the first time and maybe sometimes twice

replies.body: I noticed that her Q didn't go off sometimes. This was after useing her E+W though so maybe the other ability animations need to finish before casting Q.

> [{quoted}](name=Quinn Possible,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FkrnyO9B,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-19T07:42:03.067+0000)
>
> I noticed that her Q didn't go off sometimes. This was after useing her E+W though so maybe the other ability animations need to finish before casting Q.

I hope it's only a bug, her kit seems rather underpowered without the ability to spam
Her ult is rather finicky as well. Sometimes it'll let you on and other times it wont.
Also when I ult there seems to be a timer for when you can knock down the wall which I'm not sure if that's how it's meant to be or not
